Posts.Content: I dont really have any advice but I can share my experience with you. I have breast cancer and have undergone surguries, chemo and radiation. My mom wanted to move in. She tried so hard to do everything. She took my pain and made it hers. IN the end I am doing this one my own. She comes and helps but Its better this way. Please know I am sending you love during this difficult time.
Posts.Title: 25 year old in need of advice
